English Sentences: And Gideon went up by the way of them that dwelt in tents on the east of Nobah and Jogbehah, and smote the host: for the host was secure.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geedooni Nobaahappenne Yogibaahappe arshsho baggan de7iya bazzuwaa gaxaa ogiyaara biidi, hegan de7iya olanchchata bolli eti akeekennan de7ishin woraajjiis;

English Sentences: And when Zebah and Zalmunna fled, he pursued after them, and took the two kings of Midian, Zebah and Zalmunna, and discomfited all the host.
Wolaitta Sentences: woraajjin eti ubbai dagammidosona. Midiyaama kawoti Zebaahinne Xalmmunaa7i naa77aikka baqatidosona; shin Geedooni eta yedetti gakkidi omooddiis.

English Sentences: And Gideon the son of Joash returned from battle before the sun was up,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yo7aasha na7ai Geedooni olaappe Hereesa Pinuwaara simmiis.

English Sentences: And caught a young man of the men of Succoth, and enquired of him: and he described unto him the princes of Succoth, and the elders thereof, even threescore and seventeen men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmiiddi Sukkotappe issi wodallaa oiqqidi oichchiis. Oichchin wodallai Sukkota halaqatunne cimatu laappun tammanne laappunatu sunttaa xaafidi au immiis.

English Sentences: And he came unto the men of Succoth, and said, Behold Zebah and Zalmunna, with whom ye did upbraid me, saying, Are the hands of Zebah and Zalmunna now in thine hand, that we should give bread unto thy men that are weary?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Geedooni Sukkota asaakko yiidi, "Zebaahanne Xalmmunaa7a neeni omooddabaakkashin, ne daafurida asaassi aibissi oittaa immanee? giidi intte tana qilliiccideta; shin Zebaahanne Xalmmunaa7a hageeta be7ite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he took the elders of the city, and thorns of the wilderness and briers, and with them he taught the men of Succoth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, bazzo agunttaaninne kinddiichchuwan wadhdhidi; Sukkota halaqata qaxxayiis.

English Sentences: And he beat down the tower of Penuel, and slew the men of the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Panu7eelan katamaa naagiyo adussa gimbbiyaa laalidi, kataman de7iya attumaasaa woriis.

English Sentences: Then said he unto Zebah and Zalmunna, What manner of men were they whom ye slew at Tabor? And they answered, As thou art, so were they; each one resembled the children of a king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi Geedooni Zebaahanne Xalmmunaa7a, "Intte Taabooran worido asati ai malee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin eti, "Ne mala; eti ubbaikka kawuwaa naata milatoosona" yaagidi zaaridosona.

English Sentences: And he said, They were my brethren, even the sons of my mother: as the LORD liveth, if ye had saved them alive, I would not slay you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geedooni, "Eti ta ishantta; eti ta aayee naata. GODAI ero! Intte eta woribeennabaa gidiyaakko, taanikka inttena worikke shin" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto Jether his firstborn, Up, and slay them. But the youth drew not his sword: for he feared, because he was yet a youth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi ba baira na7aa Yetera, "Dendda eqqada, hageeta wora" yaagiis. Yaagin Yeteri biron yelaga gidido gishshau yayyidi, ba bisuwaa shoddibeenna.

English Sentences: Then Zebah and Zalmunna said, Rise thou, and fall upon us: for as the man is, so is his strength. And Gideon arose, and slew Zebah and Zalmunna, and took away the ornaments that were on their camels' necks.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Zebaahinne Xalmmunaa7i Geedoona, "Dendda eqqada, neeni nuna wora. Attumaasa ooso oottanau attumaasa koshshees" yaagidosona. Yaatin, Geedooni denddidi, eta woriis; woridi eta gaameelatu qooriyan de7iya alleeqo ubbaa ekkiis.

English Sentences: Then the men of Israel said unto Gideon, Rule thou over us, both thou, and thy son, and thy son's son also: for thou hast delivered us from the hand of Midian.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Israa7eela asai Geedoona, "Neeni nuna Midiyaama asaappe ashshido gishshau, neeni, neeppe guyyiyan ne na7ainne ne na7aa na7ai nuna haarite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Gideon said unto them, I will not rule over you, neither shall my son rule over you: the LORD shall rule over you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Geedooni, "Taani inttena haarikke; ta na7aikka inttena haarenna; GODAI inttena haarana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Gideon said unto them, I would desire a request of you, that ye would give me every man the earrings of his prey. (For they had golden earrings, because they were Ishmaelites.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi eta, "Ane taani inttena issibaa oichchais: intte ubbai omooddidi ehiido haittaa worqqaa taayyo immite" yaagiis. Isimaa7eela asaadan, Midiyaama biittaa asatikka haittan worqqaa wottoosona.

English Sentences: And they answered, We will willingly give them. And they spread a garment, and did cast therein every man the earrings of his prey.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai zaaridi, "Eeno, nu immana" yaagiis. Yaagidi afalaa hiixxidosona; hiixxidi asai ubbai ba omooddido haittaa worqqaa hiixettida afalaa bollan yeggiis.

English Sentences: And the weight of the golden earrings that he requested was a thousand and seven hundred shekels of gold; beside ornaments, and collars, and purple raiment that was on the kings of Midian, and beside the chains that were about their camels' necks.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geedooni ekkido haittaa worqqai laatamu kilo giraame deexxiyaagaa. Hegeenne, hara alleeqota, qooriyan aattiyo gozddata, Midiyaamatu kawoti maayiyo ochcha teeraa milatiya maayotanne eta gaameelatu qooriyaappe ekettida alleeqota gujjennaana.

English Sentences: And Gideon made an ephod thereof, and put it in his city, even in Ophrah: and all Israel went thither a whoring after it: which thing became a snare unto Gideon, and to his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geedooni worqqaappe eeqa misiliyaa giigissidi, ba de7iyo Oofira kataman wottiis. Guyyeppe Israa7eela asai ubbai GODAA aggidi, he eeqa misiliyaayyo goinniis; Geedoonassinne a so asaassi hegee pire gidiis.

English Sentences: Thus was Midian subdued before the children of Israel, so that they lifted up their heads no more. And the country was in quietness forty years in the days of Gideon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan hanidi, Midiyaama asai Israa7eela asaassi haarettiis; eti Israa7eela asaa bolli naa77anttuwaa denddibookkona. Geedooni haiqqana gakkanaashin, oitamu laittaa biittai woppaa demmiis.

English Sentences: And Jerubbaal the son of Joash went and dwelt in his own house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yo7aasha na7ai, Yeruba7aala giyo Geedooni ba soo guyye biidi, ba keettan de7iis.

English Sentences: And Gideon had threescore and ten sons of his body begotten: for he had many wives.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geedooni cora maccaasa ekkido gishshau, assi laappun tammu attuma naati yelettidosona.

English Sentences: And his concubine that was in Shechem, she also bare him a son, whose name he called Abimelech.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Sekeema kataman de7iya kaadumatiyaa attuma na7aa ayyo yelin, sunttaa Abimeleka yaagidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And Gideon the son of Joash died in a good old age, and was buried in the sepulchre of Joash his father, in Ophrah of the Abiezrites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yo7aasha na7ai Geedooni lo77i cimidi haiqqiis; ba aawaa Yo7aasha duufuwan moogettiis. Ha duufoi Abi7eezera yarati de7iyo Oofira kataman de7ees.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as soon as Gideon was dead, that the children of Israel turned again, and went a whoring after Baalim, and made Baalberith their god.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geedooni haiqqidoogaappe guyyiyan, Israa7eela asai GODAAPPE guyye simmidi, Ba7aala geetettiya xoossatuyyo goinniis; Ba7aali-Bariita giyo eeqaa banttayyo xoossa oottidosona.

English Sentences: And the children of Israel remembered not the LORD their God, who had delivered them out of the hands of all their enemies on every side:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi Israa7eela asai eta yuushuwan de7iya morkketu ubbaappe eta ashshida GODAA bantta Xoossaa hassayibookkona.

English Sentences: Neither shewed they kindness to the house of Jerubbaal, namely, Gideon, according to all the goodness which he had shewed unto Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Geedooni Israa7eela asaayyo oottido lo77o ooso ubbaayyo, eti a so asaayyo kehan kushiyaa zaaribookkona.

English Sentences: And Abimelech the son of Jerubbaal went to Shechem unto his mother's brethren, and communed with them, and with all the family of the house of his mother's father, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Geedoona na7ai Abimeleki Sekeema kataman de7iya ba aayee dabbotukko biis; biidi etanne ba aayee zareta ubbata hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Speak, I pray you, in the ears of all the men of Shechem, Whether is better for you, either that all the sons of Jerubbaal, which are threescore and ten persons, reign over you, or that one reign over you? remember also that I am your bone and your flesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ane Sekeema kataman de7iya asaa ubbaa hagaadan yaagidi oichchite; Geedoona laappun tammu naati ubbai inttena haarikko lo77ooyye? Woikko issi asi haarikko lo77oo? yaagidi oichchite. Taani inttessi ashuwan mata dabbo gidiyoogaa qassi dogoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And his mother's brethren spake of him in the ears of all the men of Shechem all these words: and their hearts inclined to follow Abimelech; for they said, He is our brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin a aayee dabboti ha qaala ubbaa a gishshatau Sekeema katamaa asaassi yootidosona; yootin Abimeleki etau dabbo gidido gishshau, Sekeema asai a kaallanau qofaa qachchiis.

English Sentences: And they gave him threescore and ten pieces of silver out of the house of Baalberith, wherewith Abimelech hired vain and light persons, which followed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi eti Ba7aali-Bariita Eeqaa Keettaappe laappun tammu xaqara biraa ekkidi, assi immidosona. Immin Abimeleki he biran shufurotanne bonqqiyaageeta qaxaridi, bana kaallanaadan oottiis.

English Sentences: And he went unto his father's house at Ophrah, and slew his brethren the sons of Jerubbaal, being threescore and ten persons, upon one stone: notwithstanding yet Jotham the youngest son of Jerubbaal was left; for he hid himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oofira giyoosan de7iya ba aawaa soo biidi, ba ishantta, Geedoona naata laappun tammata, issi shuchchaa bollan siifissiis. SHin Geedoona na7ai, wurssetta kaaloi, Yo7aataami qosettidi, haiqqennan attiis.

English Sentences: And all the men of Shechem gathered together, and all the house of Millo, and went, and made Abimelech king, by the plain of the pillar that was in Shechem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Sekeema asainne Beetimiillo asai issippe shiiqidi, Sekeeman de7iya goinniyo wolaakko biidosona; biidi yan Abimeleka kawoyidosona.

English Sentences: And when they told it to Jotham, he went and stood in the top of mount Gerizim, and lifted up his voice, and cried, and said unto them, Hearken unto me, ye men of Shechem, that God may hearken unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yo7aataami hegaa siyido wode, biidi Gariizaana Deriyaa xeeraa kiyidi, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, hagaadan yaagidi waassiis; "Inttenoo Sekeema asatoo, intte taani odiyoogaa siyite! Xoossaikka intte odiyoogaa siyana.

English Sentences: The trees went forth on a time to anoint a king over them; and they said unto the olive tree, Reign thou over us.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi gallassi mittati ubbai shiiqidi, bantta bolli kawuwaa kawoyanau biidosona; biiddi wogaraa, Haaya, nu bolli kawota yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But the olive tree said unto them, Should I leave my fatness, wherewith by me they honour God and man, and go to be promoted over the trees?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin wogarai, Ta intte bolli kawotana koshshiyaabaa gidikko, xoossatanne asata bonchchissiya ta zaitiyaa immiyoogaa aggais giyoogaa yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: And the trees said to the fig tree, Come thou, and reign over us.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, mittati balasiyaa giyo mittaa, Haaya, nu bolli kawota yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But the fig tree said unto them, Should I forsake my sweetness, and my good fruit, and go to be promoted over the trees?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin balasee, Ta intte bolli kawotana koshshiyaabaa gidikko, mal77iya lo77o aifiyaa aifiyoogaa aggais giyoogaa yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: Then said the trees unto the vine, Come thou, and reign over us.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaatin, mittati woiniyaa turaa, Haaya, nu bolli kawota yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the vine said unto them, Should I leave my wine, which cheereth God and man, and go to be promoted over the trees?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin woiniyaa turai, Ta intte bolli kawotana koshshiyaabaa gidikko, xoossatanne asata ufaissiya woiniyaa eessaa immiyoogaa aggais giyoogaa yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: Then said all the trees unto the bramble, Come thou, and reign over us.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yaatin, wurssettan mittati ubbai kinddiichchuwaa, Haaya, nu bolli kawota yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the bramble said unto the trees, If in truth ye anoint me king over you, then come and put your trust in my shadow: and if not, let fire come out of the bramble, and devour the cedars of Lebanon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kinddiichchoi, Intte tumuppe tana intte bolli kawoyanau koyikko, haa yiidi ta kuwan shemppite. Hegaa intte ixxikko, kinddiichchuwaappe tamai kiyidi, Liibaanoosa zigata mo yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now therefore, if ye have done truly and sincerely, in that ye have made Abimelech king, and if ye have dealt well with Jerubbaal and his house, and have done unto him according to the deserving of his hands;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abimeleka intte kawoyidoogee tumatettaaneenne suuretettaanee? Geedooni intteyyo oottidobaa akeekidi, a keettaa asaayyo bessiyaadan kushiyaa zaaridetii?

English Sentences: (For my father fought for you, and adventured his life far, and delivered you out of the hand of Midian:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta aawai intteyyo olettidoogaa akeekite; Midiyaama asaappe inttena ashshana yaagidi, bana haiquwau aattidi immiis.

English Sentences: And ye are risen up against my father's house this day, and have slain his sons, threescore and ten persons, upon one stone, and have made Abimelech, the son of his maidservant, king over the men of Shechem, because he is your brother;)
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte hachchi ta aawaa keettaa asaa bollan denddidi, a laappun tammu naata issi shuchchaa bollan siifideta; Geedooni ashkkareeppe yelido Abimeleki intteyyo dabbo gidido gishshau, Sekeeman kawoyideta.

English Sentences: If ye then have dealt truly and sincerely with Jerubbaal and with his house this day, then rejoice ye in Abimelech, and let him also rejoice in you:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i simmi Geedoonassinne a keettaa asatussi intte oottido oosoi tumatettaananne suuretettaana gidikko, Abimelekaara issippe ufaittite; ikka inttenaara ufaitto.

English Sentences: But if not, let fire come out from Abimelech, and devour the men of Shechem, and the house of Millo; and let fire come out from the men of Shechem, and from the house of Millo, and devour Abimelech.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hegaa gidana xayikko, Abimelekappe tamai kiyidi, Sekeema asaanne Beetimiillo asaa mo; hegaadankka qassi, Sekeema asaappenne Beetimiillo asaappe tamai kiyidi, Abimeleka mo" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jotham ran away, and fled, and went to Beer, and dwelt there, for fear of Abimelech his brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi Yo7aataami ba ishaa Abimelekassi yayyido gishshau, baqatidi Ba7eera giyoosaa biidi yan de7iis.

English Sentences: When Abimelech had reigned three years over Israel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Abimeleki Israa7eela biittan heezzu laitta kawotiis.

English Sentences: Then God sent an evil spirit between Abimelech and the men of Shechem; and the men of Shechem dealt treacherously with Abimelech:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Xoossai Abimelekappenne Sekeema asaappe gidduwan iita ayyaanaa kiittiis; kiittin Sekeema asai Abimeleka bolli makkalidi denddiis.

English Sentences: That the cruelty done to the threescore and ten sons of Jerubbaal might come, and their blood be laid upon Abimelech their brother, which slew them; and upon the men of Shechem, which aided him in the killing of his brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hegaa oottidoogee, Abimeleki ba ishantta worido gishshaassanne Geedoona laappun tammu naata i woranaadan Sekeema asai a minttettido gishshaassa.

English Sentences: And the men of Shechem set liers in wait for him in the top of the mountains, and they robbed all that came along that way by them: and it was told Abimelech.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sekeema asai amarida asaa dooridi, deriyaa xeeran Abimeleka bolli zuggidi uttanaadan oottiis. Zuggi uttidaageeti ogiyaara kanttiya asaa ubbaa bonqqidosona; bonqqin Abimeleki hegaa ubbaa siyiis.

English Sentences: And Gaal the son of Ebed came with his brethren, and went over to Shechem: and the men of Shechem put their confidence in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Ebeeda na7ai Ga7aali ba ishanttuura Sekeema yiis; yin Sekeema asai an ammanettiis.

English Sentences: And they went out into the fields, and gathered their vineyards, and trode the grapes, and made merry, and went into the house of their god, and did eat and drink, and cursed Abimelech.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaikka bantta gade biidi, woiniyaa teeraa maxidosona; maxidi woiniyaa eessaa agidi, gita gibiraa kessidosona. Bantta eeqa keettaa gelidi, yan miiddinne uyiiddi Abimeleka cayidosona.

English Sentences: And Gaal the son of Ebed said, Who is Abimelech, and who is Shechem, that we should serve him? is not he the son of Jerubbaal? and Zebul his officer? serve the men of Hamor the father of Shechem: for why should we serve him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ebeeda na7ai Ga7aali, "Nuuni Sekeema asai haarettanau Abimeleki oonee? I Geedoona na7aa gidennee? Zabuulikka ha katamaa haaranaadan Abimeleki sunttidoogaa gidennee? Hegaappe nu maizza aawaa Hamoora zaretussi ane haarettoos.

English Sentences: And would to God this people were under my hand! then would I remove Abimelech. And he said to Abimelech, Increase thine army, and come out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha asaa kaalettiyaagee tana gidarkkinaashsha! Yaatiyaakko taani Abimeleka diggana shin. Abimeleka xeesada, Ne olanchchata darissa ekkada, olettanau haaya yaagana shin" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when Zebul the ruler of the city heard the words of Gaal the son of Ebed, his anger was kindled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ebeeda na7ai Ga7aali giidoogaa katamaa haariya Zabuuli siyido wode, hanqquwaa eexxi kiyiis;

English Sentences: And he sent messengers unto Abimelech privily, saying, Behold, Gaal the son of Ebed and his brethren be come to Shechem; and, behold, they fortify the city against thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: yaatidi Aruuma kataman de7iya Abimelekakko asa kiittiis. Kiittidi, "Ebeeda na7ai Ga7aalinne a ishantti Sekeema yiidosona; yiidi kataman de7iya asaa ne bolli denttettoosona.

English Sentences: Now therefore up by night, thou and the people that is with thee, and lie in wait in the field:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, neeninne nenaara de7iya asai qamman denddidi, shooqan zuggidi naagite.

English Sentences: And it shall be, that in the morning, as soon as the sun is up, thou shalt rise early, and set upon the city: and, behold, when he and the people that is with him come out against thee, then mayest thou do to them as thou shalt find occasion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wontto maallado awai mokkiyo wode, eti akeekennan katama bolli woraajjite; Ga7aalinne aara de7iya asai inttena olanau kiyiyo wode, intteyyo hanettido keenaa minnidi olettite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Abimelech rose up, and all the people that were with him, by night, and they laid wait against Shechem in four companies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Abimelekinne aara de7iya asai ubbai qamman denddidi, Sekeemappe kareera oiddu citan shaahettidi zuggidosona.

English Sentences: And Gaal the son of Ebed went out, and stood in the entering of the gate of the city: and Abimelech rose up, and the people that were with him, from lying in wait.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abimelekinne aara de7iya asai Ebeeda na7ai Ga7aali kiyidi, katamaa geliyo penggiyan eqqidaagaa be7idi, qosettido sohuwaappe kiyidosona.

English Sentences: And when Gaal saw the people, he said to Zebul, Behold, there come people down from the top of the mountains. And Zebul said unto him, Thou seest the shadow of the mountains as if they were men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ga7aali asaa be7ido wode Zabuula, "Xeella! Asai deretu huuphiyaappe wodhdhees" yaagiis. Yaagin Zabuuli, "Hegeeti asa gidokkona; deretu eeshoi asaa milatiyaagaa be7ada gaasa" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: And Gaal spake again and said, See there come people down by the middle of the land, and another company come along by the plain of Meonenim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ga7aali zaarettidi, "Xeella! Asai deriyaassi gidduwaa oiqqidi wodhdhees; hara citai qassi SHareechchotu Wolai de7iyo ogiyaara yees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said Zebul unto him, Where is now thy mouth, wherewith thou saidst, Who is Abimelech, that we should serve him? is not this the people that thou hast despised? go out, I pray now, and fight with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Zabuuli Ga7aala, "Nuuni ayyo haarettanau Abimeleki oonee? yaagido ne doonai ha77i au biidee? Hageeti neeni karido asata gidokkonaayye? Ha77i kiyada etaara oletta!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Gaal went out before the men of Shechem, and fought with Abimelech.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Ga7aali Sekeema asaa kaaletti kiyidi, Abimelekaara olettiis.

English Sentences: And Abimelech chased him, and he fled before him, and many were overthrown and wounded, even unto the entering of the gate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abimeleki yedettin, Ga7aali baqatiis; katamaa geliyo penggiyaa gakkanaassi daroti deshettidi kunddidosona.

English Sentences: And Abimelech dwelt at Arumah: and Zebul thrust out Gaal and his brethren, that they should not dwell in Shechem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abimeleki Aruuman de7in, Zabuuli Ga7aalanne a ishantta Sekeemappe yedettidi kessiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass on the morrow, that the people went out into the field; and they told Abimelech.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi Sekeema asai goshshau biidoogaa Abimeleki siyiis;

English Sentences: And he took the people, and divided them into three companies, and laid wait in the field, and looked, and, behold, the people were come forth out of the city; and he rose up against them, and smote them.
Wolaitta Sentences: siyidi ba asaa ekkidi, heezzu citan shaakkidi, shooqan zuggidi naaganaadan oottiis. Yaatidi asai katamaappe kiyiyoogaa be7ido wode, eta woranau qosettido sohuwaappe kiyiis.

English Sentences: And Abimelech, and the company that was with him, rushed forward, and stood in the entering of the gate of the city: and the two other companies ran upon all the people that were in the fields, and slew them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abimelekinne aara de7iya citai sinttau woxxi biidi, katamaa geliyo penggiyan eqqidosona; attida naa77u citati goshshan de7iya asata olidi woridosona.

English Sentences: And Abimelech fought against the city all that day; and he took the city, and slew the people that was therein, and beat down the city, and sowed it with salt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassa muliyaa Abimeleki katamaa asaara olettiis; olettidi katamaa oiqqidoogaappe guyyiyan, kataman de7iya asaa ubbaa woriis. Yaatidi katamaa qoliis; qolidi ubbaa biittaa bolli maxiniyaa zeriis.

English Sentences: And when all the men of the tower of Shechem heard that, they entered into an hold of the house of the god Berith.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sekeema Adussa Gimbbiyaa giddon de7iya asai ubbai hegaa siyido wode, Ba7aali-Bariita Eeqa Keettan de7iya qato giddo geliis.

English Sentences: And it was told Abimelech, that all the men of the tower of Shechem were gathered together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti he sohuwan shiiqidoogaa Abimeleki siyiis.

English Sentences: And Abimelech gat him up to mount Zalmon, he and all the people that were with him; and Abimelech took an axe in his hand, and cut down a bough from the trees, and took it, and laid it on his shoulder, and said unto the people that were with him, What ye have seen me do, make haste, and do as I have done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyidi inne aara de7iya asai ubbai Xalmmoona giyo deriyaa pude kiyidosona. Kiyin Abimeleki kalttaa ekkidi, mittaa tashiyaa qanxxidi, ba hashiyan tookkiis; tookkidi banaara de7iya asata, "Taani oottishin be7idoogaa, inttekka eesuwan ha77i oottite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And all the people likewise cut down every man his bough, and followed Abimelech, and put them to the hold, and set the hold on fire upon them; so that all the men of the tower of Shechem died also, about a thousand men and women.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin asai ubbaikka mittaa tashiyaa qanxxi ekkidi, Abimeleka kaalliis; he tasheta qatuwaa yuushuwan zemppissi wottidi, asai a giddon de7ishin tamaa oittidosona; yaatin, qatuwaa giddon de7iya asai ubbai haiqqi wuriis. Haiqqida attuma asaanne macca asaa qoodai issi sha7aa gidana.

English Sentences: Then went Abimelech to Thebez, and encamped against Thebez, and took it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Abimeleki Tebexa giyo katamaa biidi, katamaa dooddidi oiqqiis.

English Sentences: But there was a strong tower within the city, and thither fled all the men and women, and all they of the city, and shut it to them, and gat them up to the top of the tower.
Wolaitta Sentences: He katamaa giddon issi mino adussa gimbbee de7ees. Katamaa asai ubbai, maccai attumai, kaalettiyaageetuurakka attennan he adussa gimbbiyaakko yaa woxxidi, a giddo gelidosona; penggiyaa gorddidi, gimbbiyaa bolli dembbayidi keexxidosaa pude kiyidosona.

English Sentences: And Abimelech came unto the tower, and fought against it, and went hard unto the door of the tower to burn it with fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abimeleki olettiiddi adussa gimbbiyaa gakkidi, taman xuugganau penggiyaakko shiiqiis.

English Sentences: And a certain woman cast a piece of a millstone upon Abimelech's head, and all to brake his skull.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin issi maccaasiyaa Abimeleka huuphiyan woxaa maidiyaa gonddorssa olada, a guuggiyaa homppu oottaasu.

English Sentences: Then he called hastily unto the young man his armourbearer, and said unto him, Draw thy sword, and slay me, that men say not of me, A woman slew him. And his young man thrust him through, and he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba ola miishshaa tookkiya wodallaa eesuwan xeegidi, "Tana asi, Ebela maccaasi woriis geennaadan, ne bisuwaa shoohuwaappe shoddada, tana wora" yaagiis. Yaagin wodallai caddin i haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And when the men of Israel saw that Abimelech was dead, they departed every man unto his place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai ubbai Abimeleki haiqqidoogaa be7idi, ba soo ba soo biis.

English Sentences: Thus God rendered the wickedness of Abimelech, which he did unto his father, in slaying his seventy brethren:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abimeleki ba ishantta laappun tammata woridi, ba aawaa bolli oottido gomiyaa Xoossai a bolli zaariis.

English Sentences: And all the evil of the men of Shechem did God render upon their heads: and upon them came the curse of Jotham the son of Jerubbaal.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, Xoossai Sekeema asaa iitatetta ubbaa eta bolli zaariis. Hegaadan hanidi, Geedoona na7ai Yo7aataami qanggido qanggettai eta gakkiis.

English Sentences: And after Abimelech there arose to defend Israel Tola the son of Puah, the son of Dodo, a man of Issachar; and he dwelt in Shamir in mount Ephraim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abimeleki haiqqidoogaappe guyyiyan, Doodo na7aa Puuha na7ai Tolaa7i Israa7eela ashshanau denddiis. I Yisaakoora zare gididi, Efireema gezziyan SHamiira giyoosan de7iis.

English Sentences: And he judged Israel twenty and three years, and died, and was buried in Shamir.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tolaa7i Israa7eela asaa laatamanne heezzu laittau pirddiya daanna gidiis. Tolaa7i haiqqidi, SHamiiran moogettiis.

English Sentences: And after him arose Jair, a Gileadite, and judged Israel twenty and two years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tolaa7appe kaallidi, Gala7aadiyaa Yaa7iiri denddiis; denddidi Israa7eela asaa laatamanne naa77u laittau pirddiya daanna gidiis.

English Sentences: And he had thirty sons that rode on thirty ass colts, and they had thirty cities, which are called Havothjair unto this day, which are in the land of Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Assi hasttamu hareta toggiya hasttamu attuma naati de7oosona; etassi Gala7aade biittan hasttamu katamati de7oosona. He katamati hachchi gakkanaassi Yaa7iira katamata geetettidi xeesettoosona.

English Sentences: And Jair died, and was buried in Camon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7iiri haiqqidi, Qaamoonan moogettiis.

English Sentences: And the children of Israel did evil again in the sight of the LORD, and served Baalim, and Ashtaroth, and the gods of Syria, and the gods of Zidon, and the gods of Moab, and the gods of the children of Ammon, and the gods of the Philistines, and forsook the LORD, and served not him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai GODAA sinttan qassikka iitabaa oottiis; eti Ba7aalanne Asttaarooto geetettiya eeqatussinne Sooriyaa xoossatussi, Sidoona xoossatussi, Moo7aaba xoossatussi, Amoonatu xoossatussinne Pilisxxeema xoossatussi goinnidosona. Eti GODAA aggi bayidosona; ayyo goinniyoogaakka aggiigidosona.

English Sentences: And the anger of the LORD was hot against Israel, and he sold them into the hands of the Philistines, and into the hands of the children of Ammon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, GODAI Israa7eela asaa bolli hanqqettidi, eta Pilisxxeema asatussinne Amoona asatussi aattidi immiis.

English Sentences: And that year they vexed and oppressed the children of Israel: eighteen years, all the children of Israel that were on the other side Jordan in the land of the Amorites, which is in Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Immin he laitti Israa7eela asaa eti naaqqidosonanne huqqunnidosona. Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefintta arshsho baggan, Amooreti kase de7ido Gala7aade biittan de7ida Israa7eela asaa ubbaa eti tammanne hosppun laittaa huqqunnidosona.

English Sentences: Moreover the children of Ammon passed over Jordan to fight also against Judah, and against Benjamin, and against the house of Ephraim; so that Israel was sore distressed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoona asati qassikka Yihudaa, Biniyaamanne Efireema zareta olanau Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnidosona; yaatin, Israa7eela asai keehippe un77ettiis.

English Sentences: And the children of Israel cried unto the LORD, saying, We have sinned against thee, both because we have forsaken our God, and also served Baalim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Israa7eela asati, "Nuuni nena nu Xoossaa aggidi, Ba7aala eeqatussi goinnidi, nena naaqqida" yaagidi GODAASSI waassidosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto the children of Israel, Did not I deliver you from the Egyptians, and from the Amorites, from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines?
Wolaitta Sentences: Waassin GODAI etau, "Gibxxeti, Amooreti, Pilisxxeemati,

English Sentences: The Zidonians also, and the Amalekites, and the Maonites, did oppress you; and ye cried to me, and I delivered you out of their hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sidoonati, Amaaleeqatinne Maa7oonati inttena huqqunnin, taassi waassideta; waassin taani inttena eta kushiyaappe ashshabeikkinaa?

English Sentences: Yet ye have forsaken me, and served other gods: wherefore I will deliver you no more.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte tana aggidi, hara xoossatussi goinnideta. Hegaa gishshau, taani inttena mulekka ashshikke.

English Sentences: Go and cry unto the gods which ye have chosen; let them deliver you in the time of your tribulation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi intte doorido xoossatussi waassite. Intte metuwaa wode eti inttena ashshona" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: And the children of Israel said unto the LORD, We have sinned: do thou unto us whatsoever seemeth good unto thee; deliver us only, we pray thee, this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Israa7eela asai zaarettidi GODAA, "Nuuni nagaraa oottida. Neeyyo lo77o milatiyaaba nu bolli ootta; shin hayyanaa, hachchi nuna ashsha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they put away the strange gods from among them, and served the LORD: and his soul was grieved for the misery of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi allaga xoossata bantta giddoppe diggidi, GODAAYYO goinnidosona. Israa7eela asai tuggatidoogau GODAIKKA mishettiis.

English Sentences: Then the children of Ammon were gathered together, and encamped in Gilead. And the children of Israel assembled themselves together, and encamped in Mizpeh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Amoonatu olanchchati olau giigidi, Gala7aaden galchchidosona; Israa7eela asaikka issippe shiiqidi, Gala7aaden Mixiphpha giyoosan galchchiis.

English Sentences: And the people and princes of Gilead said one to another, What man is he that will begin to fight against the children of Ammon? he shall be head over all the inhabitants of Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aade biittaa asainne halaqati bantta giddon, "Amoonatu olanchchatuura koirottidi olaa gaittanai oonee? He urai Gala7aade biittan de7iya asau ubbau halaqa gidana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Now Jephthah the Gileadite was a mighty man of valour, and he was the son of an harlot: and Gilead begat Jephthah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aadiyaa Yofttaahee mino olanchcha. A aawai Gala7aada; shin a aayyiyaa shaaramuxiya maccaasa.

English Sentences: And Gilead's wife bare him sons; and his wife's sons grew up, and they thrust out Jephthah, and said unto him, Thou shalt not inherit in our father's house; for thou art the son of a strange woman.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aadee ekkido machchiyaakka assi attuma naata yelaasu. Eti dicci gakkido wode, bantta ishaa Yofttaaha, "Neeni hara maccaasee na7aa gidido gishshau, nu aawaa aquwaappe aibanne laattakka" yaagidi sooppe yedettidosona.

English Sentences: Then Jephthah fled from his brethren, and dwelt in the land of Tob: and there were gathered vain men to Jephthah, and went out with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Yofttaahee ba ishanttuppe baqatidi, Xoba giyo biittan de7iis. Yan i de7ishin, amarida shufuro asati akko shiiqidi, a kaallidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in process of time, that the children of Ammon made war against Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amarida wodiyaappe guyyiyan, Amoonati Israa7eelatuura olettidosona.

English Sentences: And it was so, that when the children of Ammon made war against Israel, the elders of Gilead went to fetch Jephthah out of the land of Tob:
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoonati Israa7eela asaara olettido wode, Gala7aade biittaa cimati Xoba biittaappe Yofttaaha zaari ehanau biidosona.

English Sentences: And they said unto Jephthah, Come, and be our captain, that we may fight with the children of Ammon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi eti a, "Haaya, Amoonata nuuni olana mala, yaada nuuyyo gadaawa gida" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jephthah said unto the elders of Gilead, Did not ye hate me, and expel me out of my father's house? and why are ye come unto me now when ye are in distress?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yofttaahee Gala7aade cimata, "Tana ixxidi, ta aawaa keettaappe yedettidai inttena gidekketii? Ha77i metuwan gelidi, taakko aibissi yiidetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the elders of Gilead said unto Jephthah, Therefore we turn again to thee now, that thou mayest go with us, and fight against the children of Ammon, and be our head over all the inhabitants of Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Gala7aade cimati a, "Gidikkonne, ha77i nuuni neekko simmida; aissi giikko, neeni nunaara olaa baada, Amoonata nuussi olana malanne Gala7aade asaa ubbaayyo neeni halaqaa gidana mala, nuuni koyoos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jephthah said unto the elders of Gilead, If ye bring me home again to fight against the children of Ammon, and the LORD deliver them before me, shall I be your head?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yofttaahee, "Amoonatuura olettanau intte tana guyye soo zaarin, GODAI eta ta kushiyan aattidi immikko, taani tumu intte halaqa gidanee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the elders of Gilead said unto Jephthah, The LORD be witness between us, if we do not so according to thy words.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aade cimati Yofttaaha, "GODAI nu giddon markka! Neeni giyoobaa tumu nuuni oottana" yaagidi zaaridosona.

English Sentences: Then Jephthah went with the elders of Gilead, and the people made him head and captain over them: and Jephthah uttered all his words before the LORD in Mizpeh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Yofttaahee Gala7aade cimatuura biis; bin a bantta halaqanne gadaawa oottidosona. Yofttaahee Mixiphphan GODAA sinttan ha yohuwaa ubbaa maayiis.

English Sentences: And Jephthah sent messengers unto the king of the children of Ammon, saying, What hast thou to do with me, that thou art come against me to fight in my land?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yofttaahee Amoonatu kawuwaakko asaa kiittidi, "Neeni nu biittaa bollan woraajjidoogee aibi gaasuwaanee?" yaagidi oishissiis.

English Sentences: And the king of the children of Ammon answered unto the messengers of Jephthah, Because Israel took away my land, when they came up out of Egypt, from Arnon even unto Jabbok, and unto Jordan: now therefore restore those lands again peaceably.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yofttaahee kiittido asatuyyo Amoonatu biittaa kawoi zaaridi, "Israa7eela asai Gibxxe biittaappe kiyido wode, Arnnoona SHaafaappe doommidi, Yaabooqa SHaafaa gakkanaashin, qassi Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa gakkanaashin de7iya ta biittaa ekkiis. Ha77i ta biittaa saruwan zaarite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jephthah sent messengers again unto the king of the children of Ammon:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yofttaahee naa77anttuwaakka Amoonatu kawuwaakko asaa kiittiis.

English Sentences: And said unto him, Thus saith Jephthah, Israel took not away the land of Moab, nor the land of the children of Ammon:
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiittiiddi hagaadan yaagiis; "Israa7eela asai Moo7aaba biittaa woikko Amoona biittaa ekkibeenna.

English Sentences: But when Israel came up from Egypt, and walked through the wilderness unto the Red sea, and came to Kadesh;
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai Gibxxe biittaappe kiyido wode, bazzuwaa kanttidi biidi, Zo7o Abbaa gakkiis; hegaappe qassi Qaadeesa giyoosaa yiis.

English Sentences: Then Israel sent messengers unto the king of Edom, saying, Let me, I pray thee, pass through thy land: but the king of Edom would not hearken thereto. And in like manner they sent unto the king of Moab: but he would not consent: and Israel abode in Kadesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiidi Israa7eela asai Eedooma biittaa kawuwaakko asaa kiittidi, Ne biittaara nuna aattarkkii yaagiis; shin Eedooma kawoi aattennan ixxiis. Hegaadankka, Moo7aaba kawuwaakko kiittin, ikka aattennan ixxiis. Yaatin, Israa7eela asai Qaadeesan gam77iis.

English Sentences: Then they went along through the wilderness, and compassed the land of Edom, and the land of Moab, and came by the east side of the land of Moab, and pitched on the other side of Arnon, but came not within the border of Moab: for Arnon was the border of Moab.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan bazzuwaara kanttidi, eti Eedoomanne Moo7aaba biittata yuuyidi, Moo7aaba biittaappe arshsho baggaara yiidosona; yiidi Arnnoona SHaafaappe hefintta baggaara de7iya sohuwan dunkkaanidosona; shin Arnnoona SHaafai Moo7aaba zawa gidido gishshau, Moo7aaba baggi pinnibookkona.

English Sentences: And Israel sent messengers unto Sihon king of the Amorites, the king of Heshbon; and Israel said unto him, Let us pass, we pray thee, through thy land into my place.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan, Israa7eela asai Haseboona giyo kataman de7iya Amooretu Kawuwaa Sihoonakko asaa kiittiis; kiittidi eti, Hayyanaa, ne biittaara nuna nu biitti aattarkkii yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But Sihon trusted not Israel to pass through his coast: but Sihon gathered all his people together, and pitched in Jahaz, and fought against Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Sihooni Israa7eela asaa aattanau ammanibeenna. I ba asaa ubbaa shiishshidi, Yahaaxa giyoosan dunkkaanidi, Israa7eela asaara olettiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD God of Israel delivered Sihon and all his people into the hand of Israel, and they smote them: so Israel possessed all the land of the Amorites, the inhabitants of that country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olettin GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai Sihoonanne a asaa ubbaa Israa7eela asaa kushiyan aattidi immin, eta xoonidosona; xoonidi yan de7ida Amooretu biitta ubbaa laattidosona.

English Sentences: And they possessed all the coasts of the Amorites, from Arnon even unto Jabbok, and from the wilderness even unto Jordan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Arnnoona SHaafaappe biidi, Yaabooqa SHaafaa gakkanaashiininne bazzuwaappe biidi, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa gakkanaashin de7iya Amooretu biittaa ubbaa omooddidi ekkidosona.

English Sentences: So now the LORD God of Israel hath dispossessed the Amorites from before his people Israel, and shouldest thou possess it?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaadan oottidi, GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai ba asaa Israa7eela sinttaappe Amooreta yedettidi xaissiis. Yaatin, neeni neeyyo ekkanau waana qoppadii?

English Sentences: Wilt not thou possess that which Chemosh thy god giveth thee to possess? So whomsoever the LORD our God shall drive out from before us, them will we possess.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne xoossai Kamooshi neeyyo immiyoobaa ekkikkii? Hegaadankka, nuuni GODAI nu Xoossai nuuyyo immidobaa ubbaa laattidi de7ana.

English Sentences: And now art thou any thing better than Balak the son of Zippor, king of Moab? did he ever strive against Israel, or did he ever fight against them,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Bau neeni Xippoora na7aa Moo7aaba Kawuwaa Baalaaqappe minnai? I Israa7eela asaara ooyettidee woikko olettidee?

English Sentences: While Israel dwelt in Heshbon and her towns, and in Aroer and her towns, and in all the cities that be along by the coasts of Arnon, three hundred years? why therefore did ye not recover them within that time?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asai Haseboona, Aaro7eranne eta yuushuwan de7iya katamata ubbaa, hegaadankka, qassi Arnnoona SHaafaa lanqqiyan de7iya katamata ubbaa laattidi, heezzu xeetu laittaa de7iis. Yaatin, he wode aibissi wotti ekkibeekketii?

English Sentences: Wherefore I have not sinned against thee, but thou doest me wrong to war against me: the LORD the Judge be judge this day between the children of Israel and the children of Ammon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta baggaara inttena aibanne naaqqabeikke; shin tana ola olada naaqqiyai nena. Pirddiya GODAI hachchi Israa7eela asaappenne Amoona asaappe gidduwan pirddo" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Howbeit the king of the children of Ammon hearkened not unto the words of Jephthah which he sent him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yofttaahee kiittido kiitaa Amoonatu kawoi siyennan ixxiis.

English Sentences: Then the Spirit of the LORD came upon Jephthah, and he passed over Gilead, and Manasseh, and passed over Mizpeh of Gilead, and from Mizpeh of Gilead he passed over unto the children of Ammon.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode GODAA Ayyaanai Yofttaahe bolli wodhdhin, Gala7aadenne Minaase biittata kantti biiddi, Gala7aade biittan de7iya Mixiphpha simmiis; hegaappe olanchchata kaalettidi, Amoonatu biitti biis.

English Sentences: And Jephthah vowed a vow unto the LORD, and said, If thou shalt without fail deliver the children of Ammon into mine hands,
Wolaitta Sentences: Biiddi GODAASSI shiiquwaa shiiqettiiddi, "Neeni Amoonata ta kushiyan aattada immikko,

English Sentences: Then it shall be, that whatsoever cometh forth of the doors of my house to meet me, when I return in peace from the children of Ammon, shall surely be the LORD's, and I will offer it up for a burnt offering.
Wolaitta Sentences: olan xoonada taani soo simmiyo wode, tana mokkanau ta sooppe kiyiyaabi aibanne gidin neessa; taani a neessi xuuggiyo yarshsho oottada shiishshana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Jephthah passed over unto the children of Ammon to fight against them; and the LORD delivered them into his hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yofttaahee Amoonata olanau zawaa pinnidi biis; bin GODAI eta a kushiyan aattidi immiis.

English Sentences: And he smote them from Aroer, even till thou come to Minnith, even twenty cities, and unto the plain of the vineyards, with a very great slaughter. Thus the children of Ammon were subdued before the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aaro7erappe doommidi, biidi Miiniitanne Aabeeli-Karaamiima mati gakkanaashin, laatamu katamata olidi bashshiis; daro asaa wori wurssiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Amoonati Israa7eelatussi haarettidosona.

English Sentences: And Jephthah came to Mizpeh unto his house, and, behold, his daughter came out to meet him with timbrels and with dances: and she was his only child; beside her he had neither son nor daughter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yofttaahee Mixiphphan de7iya ba soo simmido wode, koirottadakka a na7iyaa karaabiyaa oiqqada yexxaiddanne duraidda a mokkanau kiyaasu. Ayyo ippe hara na7i baawa.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when he saw her, that he rent his clothes, and said, Alas, my daughter! thou hast brought me very low, and thou art one of them that trouble me: for I have opened my mouth unto the LORD, and I cannot go back.
Wolaitta Sentences: I o be7ido wode, azzanuwan ba maayuwaa pooshshidi, "Hai poora ta na7ee! Tana kaushsharggadasa; tana gakkiya metuwaayyo neeni gaaso gidadasa. Aissi giikko, taani GODAASSI shiiqetta uttaas; hegaa shiiquwaa gattennan agganau danddayikke!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And she said unto him, My father, if thou hast opened thy mouth unto the LORD, do to me according to that which hath proceeded out of thy mouth; forasmuch as the LORD hath taken vengeance for thee of thine enemies, even of the children of Ammon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin na7iyaa, "Ta aawau, neeni GODAASSI shiiqettidabaa gidikko, GODAI ne morkketu, Amoonatu bolli ne haluwaa kessido gishshau, neeni shiiqettidobaa ta bolli pola" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And she said unto her father, Let this thing be done for me: let me alone two months, that I may go up and down upon the mountains, and bewail my virginity, I and my fellows.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka a ba aawaa, "Taayyo issibaa oottarkkii. Taani muleera azina gelennan attiyo gishshau, ta laggetuura baada deretu bolli ta geela7otettaassi yeekkana mala, naa77u aginau tana yeddarkkii" yaagada oichchaasu.

English Sentences: And he said, Go. And he sent her away for two months: and she went with her companions, and bewailed her virginity upon the mountains.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin i, "Ba" yaagidi, naa77u aginau yeddiis; yeddin a ba laggetuura deriyaa huuphiyaa kiyada ba geela7otettaassi etaara yeekkaasu.

English Sentences: And it came to pass at the end of two months, that she returned unto her father, who did with her according to his vow which he had vowed: and she knew no man. And it was a custom in Israel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77u aginaappe guyyiyan, ba aawaakko simmada yaasu; yin GODAASSI ba shiiqettido shiiquwaa gattiis. A mulekka attumaasan gaittennan attaasu.

English Sentences: That the daughters of Israel went yearly to lament the daughter of Jephthah the Gileadite four days in a year.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wodeppe doommidi, Israa7eelatu macca naati laittan laittan oiddu gallassaa bantta sooppe haakki biidi, Gala7aadiyaa Yofttaahee na7eessi yeekkiyoogeenne azzaniyoogee meeze gidiis.

English Sentences: And the men of Ephraim gathered themselves together, and went northward, and said unto Jephthah, Wherefore passedst thou over to fight against the children of Ammon, and didst not call us to go with thee? we will burn thine house upon thee with fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema asai olaa baanau xeegettidi, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnidi, Xafoona giyo katamaa gakkido wode, Yofttaaha, "Amoonata olanau zawaa pinnada baidda, nenaara baanaadan aissi nuna xeesabeikkii? Nuunikka ne keettaa ne bolli taman xuuggana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jephthah said unto them, I and my people were at great strife with the children of Ammon; and when I called you, ye delivered me not out of their hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yofttaahee eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Taaninne ta asai Amoonatuura keehippe warettido wode, taani inttena xeesaas; shin intte tana etappe ashshibeekketa.

English Sentences: And when I saw that ye delivered me not, I put my life in my hands, and passed over against the children of Ammon, and the LORD delivered them into my hand: wherefore then are ye come up unto me this day, to fight against me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte tana ashshennaagaa be7ido wode, zawaa pinnada ta shemppuwaassi qarettennan Amoonata olanau baas; bin GODAI eta ta kushiyan aattidi immiis. Yaatin, intte hachchi aissi tana olanau yiidetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Jephthah gathered together all the men of Gilead, and fought with Ephraim: and the men of Gilead smote Ephraim, because they said, Ye Gileadites are fugitives of Ephraim among the Ephraimites, and among the Manassites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yofttaahee Gala7aade asaa ubbaa shiishshidi, Efireema asaara olettiis; olettin Gala7aade asati xoonidosona. Aissi giikko, Efireema asai kase eta, "Intte Gala7aaden de7iya asati kase Efireema zaretuppenne Minaase zaretuppe betidi yiidaageetuppe attin, harata gidekketa" yaagi wottiis.

English Sentences: And the Gileadites took the passages of Jordan before the Ephraimites: and it was so, that when those Ephraimites which were escaped said, Let me go over; that the men of Gilead said unto him, Art thou an Ephraimite? If he said, Nay;
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema asai baqatennaadan, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinuwaa ubbaa Gala7aadeti oiqqidosona; oiqqin baqatanau koyiya Efireema asi ooninne pinnanau oichchiyo wode Gala7aadeti, "Neeni Efireema asee?" yaagidi oichchoosona. Oichchin, "Gidikke" giikko,

English Sentences: Then said they unto him, Say now Shibboleth: and he said Sibboleth: for he could not frame to pronounce it right. Then they took him, and slew him at the passages of Jordan: and there fell at that time of the Ephraimites forty and two thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ane, SHiboleeta ga" yaagoosona. SHin i, "SHi" giyo pitaliyaa loitti xeeganau danddayenna gishshau, "Siboleeta" yaagees. Yaagiyo wode oiqqidi, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinniyoosan woroosona. He wode yan Efireema asaappe oitamanne naa77u sha7u asai haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Jephthah judged Israel six years. Then died Jephthah the Gileadite, and was buried in one of the cities of Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yofttaahee Israa7eela asaa bollan daannatidi, usuppun laittaa pirddiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Gala7aadiyaa Yofttaahee haiqqiis; haiqqidi Gala7aaden de7iya ba kataman moogettiis.

English Sentences: And after him Ibzan of Bethlehem judged Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yofttaaheppe kaallidi, Beetaliheemee Ibxxaani Israa7eela asaa bolli pirddiya daanna gidiis.

English Sentences: And he had thirty sons, and thirty daughters, whom he sent abroad, and took in thirty daughters from abroad for his sons. And he judged Israel seven years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ibxxaanayyo hasttamu attuma naatinne hasttamu macca naati de7oosona; i ba macca naata ba yara gidenna attuma naatussi immiis; ba attuma naatussikka ba yara gidenna macca naata giigissidi ehiis. Ibxxaani Israa7eela bolli laappun laittaa daannatidi pirddiis.

English Sentences: Then died Ibzan, and was buried at Bethlehem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan haiqqidi, Beetaliheeme kataman moogettiis.

English Sentences: And after him Elon, a Zebulonite, judged Israel; and he judged Israel ten years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ibxxaanappe kaallidi, Zaabilooniyaa Elooni Israa7eela asaa bolli daannatidi, tammu laittaa pirddiis.

English Sentences: And Elon the Zebulonite died, and was buried in Aijalon in the country of Zebulun.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan haiqqiis; haiqqidi Zaabiloona biittan de7iya Ayyaaloona kataman moogettiis.

English Sentences: And after him Abdon the son of Hillel, a Pirathonite, judged Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eloonappe kaallidi, Hilleela na7ai Abddooni, Pir77aatoona giyoosan de7idaagee, Israa7eela bolli pirddiya daanna gidiis.

English Sentences: And he had forty sons and thirty nephews, that rode on threescore and ten ass colts: and he judged Israel eight years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abddoonayyo laappun tammu hareta toggiya oitamu attuma naatinne hasttamu naatu naati de7oosona; Abddooni Israa7eela asaa bolli daannatidi, hosppun laittaa pirddiis.

English Sentences: And Abdon the son of Hillel the Pirathonite died, and was buried in Pirathon in the land of Ephraim, in the mount of the Amalekites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Hilleela na7ai Abddooni haiqqiis; haiqqidi Amaaleeqatu gezziyan Efireema biittan de7iya Pir77aatoonan moogettiis.

English Sentences: And the children of Israel did evil again in the sight of the LORD; and the LORD delivered them into the hand of the Philistines forty years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai GODAA sinttan qassikka iitabaa oottiis. Yaatin, GODAI eta oitamu laittau Pilisxxeema asaa kushiyan aattidi immiis.

English Sentences: And there was a certain man of Zorah, of the family of the Danites, whose name was Manoah; and his wife was barren, and bare not.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Xor77a giyo kataman Maanuha giyo issi bitanee de7ees. I Daana zare; a machchiyaa maine gidido gishshau, na7a yelabeikku.

English Sentences: And the angel of the LORD appeared unto the woman, and said unto her, Behold now, thou art barren, and bearest not: but thou shalt conceive, and bear a son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi GODAA kiitanchchai he maccaaseessi qonccidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Be7a, neeni na7a yelabeenna maine; shin neeyyo ixetai attana; attin neeni attuma na7a yelana.

English Sentences: Now therefore beware, I pray thee, and drink not wine nor strong drink, and eat not any unclean thing:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, woine eessaa woikko mattoyiya ushshaa uyennaadaaninne tunabaa aibanne meennaadan naagetta.

English Sentences: For, lo, thou shalt conceive, and bear a son; and no razor shall come on his head: for the child shall be a Nazarite unto God from the womb: and he shall begin to deliver Israel out of the hand of the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeyyo ixetai attin, neeni attuma na7a yelana. Na7ai yelettiyo wodeppe doommidi, Xoossaassi dummatida Naaziraawe gidiyo gishshau, a binnaanaa mulekka meedoppa. I Israa7eela Pilisxxeema asaa kushiyaappe ashshanau doommana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the woman came and told her husband, saying, A man of God came unto me, and his countenance was like the countenance of an angel of God, very terrible: but I asked him not whence he was, neither told he me his name:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan maccaasiyaa baada, ba keettaawaassi hagaadan yaagada odaasu; "Xoossaa asa issoi taakko yiis; ayyo meraikka Xoossaa kiitanchchaa meraa mala keehippe yashshiyaagaa. I awappe yiidaakkokka taani a oichchabeikke; ikka ba sunttaa taayyo yootibeenna.

English Sentences: But he said unto me, Behold, thou shalt conceive, and bear a son; and now drink no wine nor strong drink, neither eat any unclean thing: for the child shall be a Nazarite to God from the womb to the day of his death.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i tana, Neeyyo ixetai attin, neeni attuma na7a yelana. Na7ai yelettoosappe doommidi haiqqana gakkanaassi, Xoossaassi dummatida Naaziraawe gidiyo gishshau, woine eessaa woikko mattoyiya ushshaa uyoppa; aiba tunabaakka mooppa yaagiis" yaagada yootaasu.

English Sentences: Then Manoah intreated the LORD, and said, O my Lord, let the man of God which thou didst send come again unto us, and teach us what we shall do unto the child that shall be born.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Maanuhee, "Abeet GODAU, na7ai yelettiyo wode ai oottanau koshshiyaakko erissana mala, neeni wontta kiittido Xoossaa asi nuukko simmidi yaanaadan oottarkkii" yaagidi GODAA woossiis.

English Sentences: And God hearkened to the voice of Manoah; and the angel of God came again unto the woman as she sat in the field: but Manoah her husband was not with her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woossin Xoossai Maanuhe woosaa siyiis. Maccaasiyaa gaden uttidaashin naa77anttuwaa yiis; shin he wode i keettaawai Maanuhee iira de7enna.

English Sentences: And the woman made haste, and ran, and shewed her husband, and said unto him, Behold, the man hath appeared unto me, that came unto me the other day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyaa eesuwan ba keettaawaakko baada, "Be7a, ini gallassi taakko yiida bitanee hachchikka hagan de7ees" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And Manoah arose, and went after his wife, and came to the man, and said unto him, Art thou the man that spakest unto the woman? And he said, I am.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Maanuhee uttidosaappe denddidi, ba maccaasiyo kaallidi biis; bi gakkidi, bitaniyaa, "Ini ta machcheera haasayidai nenee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin bitanee, "Ee tana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Manoah said, Now let thy words come to pass. How shall we order the child, and how shall we do unto him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Maanuhee, "Neeni yootido qaalai polettiyo wode, yelettana na7aa de7uwaassinne oosuwaassi wogi aibee?" yaagidi a oichchiis.

English Sentences: And the angel of the LORD said unto Manoah, Of all that I said unto the woman let her beware.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin GODAA kiitanchchai, "Ne machchiyaa taani yootido ubbabaappe naagettu.

English Sentences: She may not eat of any thing that cometh of the vine, neither let her drink wine or strong drink, nor eat any unclean thing: all that I commanded her let her observe.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woiniyaa turaappe kiyiyaabaa aibanne muuppu; woine eessaa woikko mattoyiya ushshaa uyuppu; aiba tunabaakka muuppu. Taani iyyo yootido ubbaa polu" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: And Manoah said unto the angel of the LORD, I pray thee, let us detain thee, until we shall have made ready a kid for thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maanuhee qassi GODAA kiitanchchaa, "Nuuni neeyyo issi yelaga deeshshaa shukkidi giigissanaashin, hayyanaa takkarkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the angel of the LORD said unto Manoah, Though thou detain me, I will not eat of thy bread: and if thou wilt offer a burnt offering, thou must offer it unto the LORD. For Manoah knew not that he was an angel of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAA kiitanchchai zaaridi, "Taani takkikkokka, ne qumaa miikke. SHin neeni xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa giigissana koyikko, GODAASSI yarshshanau danddayaasa" yaagiis. I GODAA kiitanchchaa gidiyoogaa Maanuhee eribeenna.

English Sentences: And Manoah said unto the angel of the LORD, What is thy name, that when thy sayings come to pass we may do thee honour?
Wolaitta Sentences: Maanuhee qassikka GODAA kiitanchchaa, "Neeni yootido qaalai polettiyo wode, nuuni nena bonchchana mala, ne sunttai oonee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the angel of the LORD said unto him, Why askest thou thus after my name, seeing it is secret?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAA kiitanchchai a, "Ta sunttai maalaalissiyaagaa gidiyo gishshau, neeni ta sunttaa aibissi oichchai?" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: So Manoah took a kid with a meat offering, and offered it upon a rock unto the LORD: and the angel did wonderously; and Manoah and his wife looked on.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Maanuhee he deeshshaanne a kattaa yarshshuwaa ekkidi, shuchchaa bolli GODAASSI yarshshiis. Maanuheenne a maccaasiyaa xeellishin, GODAI maalaalissiyaabaa oottiis.

English Sentences: For it came to pass, when the flame went up toward heaven from off the altar, that the angel of the LORD ascended in the flame of the altar. And Manoah and his wife looked on it, and fell on their faces to the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaappe tamaa lacoi pude pololattishin, GODAA kiitanchchai tamaa lacuwaa giddoora saluwaa kiyiis. Maanuheenne a maccaasiyaa hegaa be7idi, som77uwaa sa7aa gattidi gufannidosona.

English Sentences: But the angel of the LORD did no more appear to Manoah and to his wife. Then Manoah knew that he was an angel of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA kiitanchchai Maanuhessinne a maccaaseessi naa77anttuwaa beettennan aggin, i GODAA kiitanchchaa gididoogaa Maanuhee he wode akeekiis.

English Sentences: And Manoah said unto his wife, We shall surely die, because we have seen God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maanuhee ba machchiyo, "Nuuni Xoossaa be7ido gishshau, nuuni haiqqanaagee geeshsha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But his wife said unto him, If the LORD were pleased to kill us, he would not have received a burnt offering and a meat offering at our hands, neither would he have shewed us all these things, nor would as at this time have told us such things as these.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin a zaarada, "GODAI nuna woranau koyidobaa gidiyaakko, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne kattaa yarshshuwaa nu kushiyaappe ekkenna, woikko he ubbabaa nuna bessenna, woikko hagaa nuussi odenna" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And the woman bare a son, and called his name Samson: and the child grew, and the LORD blessed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyaa attuma na7aa yelaasu; yelada Samssoona gaada sunttaasu. Na7aikka dicciis; GODAIKKA a anjjiis.

English Sentences: And the Spirit of the LORD began to move him at times in the camp of Dan between Zorah and Eshtaol.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7ai Xor77appenne Eshttaa7oolappe gidduwan de7iya Daana moottan de7ishin, GODAA Ayyaanai a denttettiyoogaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And Samson went down to Timnath, and saw a woman in Timnath of the daughters of the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi Samssooni Timina giyoosaa wodhdhiis; wodhdhidi yan issi Pilisxxeema geela7iyo be7iis.

English Sentences: And he came up, and told his father and his mother, and said, I have seen a woman in Timnath of the daughters of the Philistines: now therefore get her for me to wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Soo simmidi ba aawaanne ba aayyiyo, "Taani Timinan issi Pilisxxeema geela7iyo be7aas; ha77i o taayyo oichchidi immite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then his father and his mother said unto him, Is there never a woman among the daughters of thy brethren, or among all my people, that thou goest to take a wife of the uncircumcised Philistines? And Samson said unto his father, Get her for me; for she pleaseth me well.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin a aawainne aayyiyaa a, "Machcho oichchanau ha qaxxarettibeenna Pilisxxeematukko baanau nena aibissi koshshidee? Nu dabbotu giddon woikko nu asaa ubbaa giddon neeyyo haniya issi macca na7a demmanau danddayabeikkii?" yaagidi oichchidosona. SHin Samssooni ba aawaa, "Taani o dosido gishshau, o giigissada taayyo imma" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But his father and his mother knew not that it was of the LORD, that he sought an occasion against the Philistines: for at that time the Philistines had dominion over Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeemata olanau GODAI gaasuwaa koyidi, hagaa eta bolli oottiyoogaa Samssoona aawainne aayyiyaanne eribookkona. He wode Pilisxxeemati Israa7eela asaa haaroosona.

English Sentences: Then went Samson down, and his father and his mother, to Timnath, and came to the vineyards of Timnath: and, behold, a young lion roared against him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Samssooni ba aawaaranne ba aayeera Timina wodhdhiis. Yan woiniyaa turaa giddoora i kanttidi biishin, issi wodala gaammoi gudiiddi a bolli kiyiis.

English Sentences: And the Spirit of the LORD came mightily upon him, and he rent him as he would have rent a kid, and he had nothing in his hand: but he told not his father or his mother what he had done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiyin GODAA Ayyaanai Samssoona bollan wolqqappe wodhdhiis; wodhdhin deeshsha maraa duuterettiyoogaadan, ba kushiyan aibanne oikkennan gaammuwaa duuteretti yeggiis. He ba oottidoogaa ba aawaassinne ba aayeessi odibeenna.

English Sentences: And he went down, and talked with the woman; and she pleased Samson well.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan biidi, geela7iyo haasayissiis; haasayissidi o dosiis.

English Sentences: And after a time he returned to take her, and he turned aside to see the carcase of the lion: and, behold, there was a swarm of bees and honey in the carcase of the lion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guutta wodiyaappe guyyiyan, o bullachchanau yaa simmidi biis; biiddi ba worido gaammuwaa gauxaa be7anau ogiyaappe sher77i giidi biyo wode, gaammuwaa gauxaa giddon mattai eessaa eessidoogaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And he took thereof in his hands, and went on eating, and came to his father and mother, and he gave them, and they did eat: but he told not them that he had taken the honey out of the carcase of the lion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7idi eessaappe amaridaagaa kaashi ekkidi, ogiyan miiddi biis. Ba aawaakkonne ba aayeekko gakkidi, ba oikkido eessaappe amaridaagaa immin, etikka miidosona; shin Samssooni he eessaa gaammuwaa gauxaa giddoppe ekkidoogaa etau odibeenna.

English Sentences: So his father went down unto the woman: and Samson made there a feast; for so used the young men to do.
Wolaitta Sentences: A aawai maccaasee soo bin, Samssooni yan gibiraa giigissiis. Hegaa mala gibirai bullachchaawu kaseesappekka oottiyo woga.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when they saw him, that they brought thirty companions to be with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He asai a be7ido wode, aara takkanaadan hasttamu wodalla naata dooriis.

English Sentences: And Samson said unto them, I will now put forth a riddle unto you: if ye can certainly declare it me within the seven days of the feast, and find it out, then I will give you thirty sheets and thirty change of garments:
Wolaitta Sentences: Samssooni eta, "Ane intte eriyaakkonne issi qan77ishiyaa taani inttena qan77ishais; bullachchaa baalai bonchchettiyo laappun gallassatu giddon ha qan77ishiyaa birshshettaa taassi intte yootiyaabaa gidikko, taani inttessi hasttamu liino iirichchotanne hasttamu kumetta maayota immana.

English Sentences: But if ye cannot declare it me, then shall ye give me thirty sheets and thirty change of garments. And they said unto him, Put forth thy riddle, that we may hear it.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte taayyo birshshettaa yootanau danddayana xayikko, intte taayyo hasttamu liino iirichchotanne hasttamu kumetta maayota immeeta" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "Ero, ne qan77ishiyaa ane nuussi yoota" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Out of the eater came forth meat, and out of the strong came forth sweetness. And they could not in three days expound the riddle.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta, "Miyaagaappe miyoobai beettiis. Minuwaa giddoppe mal77iyaabai kiyiis" yaagiis. Heezzantto gallassi gakkanaassi eti qan77ishiyaa birshshettaa immanau danddayibookkona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass on the seventh day, that they said unto Samson's wife, Entice thy husband, that he may declare unto us the riddle, lest we burn thee and thy father's house with fire: have ye called us to take that we have? is it not so?
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiddantto gallassi eti Samssoona machchiyo, "Ane ne keettaawaa cimmada qan77ishiyaa birshshettaa i nuuyyo yootanaadan ootta. Hegee xayikko, nuuni nenanne ne aawaa keettaa taman xuuggana. Intte nuna xeesidoogee nuna manqqettanaassee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Samson's wife wept before him, and said, Thou dost but hate me, and lovest me not: thou hast put forth a riddle unto the children of my people, and hast not told it me. And he said unto her, Behold, I have not told it my father nor my mother, and shall I tell it thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Samssoona machchiyaa yeekkaidda akko shiiqada, "Neeni tana siiqakka! Neeni tana keehippe ixxaasa! Aissi giikko, neeni ta biittaa asaa qan77ishiyaa qan77ishada, a birshshettaa taassi yootabaakka" yaagaasu. Yaagin i zaaridi, "Be7a, hagaa taani ta aawaassikka ta aayeessikka yootabeikke. Yaatin, neessi aibissi yootoo?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And she wept before him the seven days, while their feast lasted: and it came to pass on the seventh day, that he told her, because she lay sore upon him: and she told the riddle to the children of her people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin bullachchaa baalai bonchchettiyo laappun gallassatu ubban yeekkada shemppuwaa diggin, laappuntta gallassi qan77ishiyaa birshshettaa iyyo yootiis. Yootin akka baada ba biittaa asaayyo yootaasu.

English Sentences: And the men of the city said unto him on the seventh day before the sun went down, What is sweeter than honey? And what is stronger than a lion? And he said unto them, If ye had not plowed with my heifer, ye had not found out my riddle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, laappuntta gallassi awai wullanaappe kase katamaa asati ba zaaruwaa ekki yiidi, Samssoona, "Eessaappe aadhdhidi mal77iyaabi, gaammoppe aadhdhidi minniyaabi aibee?" yaagidosona. Yaagin Samssooni eta, "Intte ta ussen goyennabaa gidiyaakko, ta qan77ishiyaa birshshettaa erekketa shin" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the Spirit of the LORD came upon him, and he went down to Ashkelon, and slew thirty men of them, and took their spoil, and gave change of garments unto them which expounded the riddle. And his anger was kindled, and he went up to his father's house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAA Ayyaanai a bollan wolqqappe wodhdhin, Asqqaloona katamaa wodhdhidi, hasttamu asata woriis; woridi eta maayuwaa qaari ekkidi, qan77ishiyaa birshshida asatussi ehiidi immiis. Hanidaban ubban hanqquwaa suulliiddi, ba aawaa soo simmidi biis.

English Sentences: But Samson's wife was given to his companion, whom he had used as his friend.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bin Samssoona machchiyaa a laggiyaassi, a waanna miiziyaassi imettaasu.

English Sentences: But it came to pass within a while after, in the time of wheat harvest, that Samson visited his wife with a kid; and he said, I will go in to my wife into the chamber. But her father would not suffer him to go in.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guuttaa takkishin, gisttiyaa cakkiyo wode, Samssooni ba machchiyo be7anau issi anqqaara deeshshaa ekkidi biis; biidi i aawaa, "Taani ta machchiyaa de7iyo kifiliyaa gelanau koyais" yaagiis. SHin i gelennaadan, i aawai diggiis.

English Sentences: And her father said, I verily thought that thou hadst utterly hated her; therefore I gave her to thy companion: is not her younger sister fairer than she? take her, I pray thee, instead of her.
Wolaitta Sentences: I aawai Samssoona, "Neeni o ubba ixxidabaa milatin, ne miiziyaayyo immaas. SHin i kaalo michchiyaa ippekka aadhdha lo77o; i gishshaa o ekka" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samson said concerning them, Now shall I be more blameless than the Philistines, though I do them a displeasure.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Samssooni etau, "Ha77i simmi Pilisxxeema biittaa asaa bolli taani iitabaa oottikko, mooranchcha gidikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Samson went and caught three hundred foxes, and took firebrands, and turned tail to tail, and put a firebrand in the midst between two tails.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi biidi, heezzu xeetu worakanata oiqqiis; oiqqidi naa77aa naa77aa goinaa issippe gattidi, goinatuppe gidduwan yiicettida xomppiyaa wottidi qachchiis.

English Sentences: And when he had set the brands on fire, he let them go into the standing corn of the Philistines, and burnt up both the shocks, and also the standing corn, with the vineyards and olives.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, yiicettida xomppiyan tamaa oittidi, biron cakettibeenna Pilisxxeema asaa kattaa giddo worakanata yeddiis; yeddidi cakettida kattaa, equwan de7iya kattaa, woiniyaa turatanne wogaraa xuuggiis.

English Sentences: Then the Philistines said, Who hath done this? And they answered, Samson, the son in law of the Timnite, because he had taken his wife, and given her to his companion. And the Philistines came up, and burnt her and her father with fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeemati, "Hagaa oottidai oonee?" yaagidi oichchidosona. Oichchin asai, "Samssooni oottiis; aissi giikko, Timina asa gidiya a bolloi, a machchiyo a miiziyaayyo immido gishshaassa" yaagiis. Yaagin Pilisxxeemati biidi, onne i aawaa taman xuuggidosona.

English Sentences: And Samson said unto them, Though ye have done this, yet will I be avenged of you, and after that I will cease.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xuuggin Samssooni etau, "Intte hegaa oottido gishshau, haluwaa kessennan aggikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he smote them hip and thigh with a great slaughter: and he went down and dwelt in the top of the rock Etam.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi eta wolqqaama shochchaa shocidi, darota woriis. Hegaappe guyyiyan biidi, Exaama giyo sohuwan de7iya zaallaa kooppuwaa giddon gam77iis.

English Sentences: Then the Philistines went up, and pitched in Judah, and spread themselves in Lehi.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Pilisxxeema asai yiidi, Yihudan dunkkaaniis; dunkkaanidi Leeha giyo katamaa oliis.

English Sentences: And the men of Judah said, Why are ye come up against us? And they answered, To bind Samson are we come up, to do to him as he hath done to us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa asai eta, "Aibissi nuna olanau yiidetii?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin eti, "Nuuni Samssoona oikki qachchanaunne i nu bolli oottidoogaadan a bolli oottanau yiida" yaagidi zaaridosona.

English Sentences: Then three thousand men of Judah went to the top of the rock Etam, and said to Samson, Knowest thou not that the Philistines are rulers over us? what is this that thou hast done unto us? And he said unto them, As they did unto me, so have I done unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Yihudaappe heezzu sha7u asati Exaama giyo sohuwan de7iya zaallaa kooppuwaa biidi Samssoona, "Nuna haariyaageeti Pilisxxeema asata gidiyoogaa erikkiiyye? Yaatin, nu bolli hagaa aiba palabaa oottai?" yaagidosona. Yaagin i zaaridi, "Eti ta bolli oottidoogaadan, taanikka eta bolli oottaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they said unto him, We are come down to bind thee, that we may deliver thee into the hand of the Philistines. And Samson said unto them, Swear unto me, that ye will not fall upon me yourselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etikka zaarettidi, "Nuuni hagaa yiidoogee nena qachchidi, Pilisxxeematussi aattidi immanaassa" yaagidosona. Yaagin Samssooni eta, "Intte intte huuphen tana worennaadan caaqqite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they spake unto him, saying, No; but we will bind thee fast, and deliver thee into their hand: but surely we will not kill thee. And they bound him with two new cords, and brought him up from the rock.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti, "Eeno, nuuni nena qachchidi, etau aattidi immanaappe attin, worokko" yaagidi au zaaridosona. Hegaappe guyyiyan, naa77u ooratta wodoruwan qachchidi, zaallaa kooppuwaappe kessidi efiidosona.

English Sentences: And when he came unto Lehi, the Philistines shouted against him: and the Spirit of the LORD came mightily upon him, and the cords that were upon his arms became as flax that was burnt with fire, and his bands loosed from off his hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Samssooni Leeha biido wode, Pilisxxeema asati wocamiiddi, aara gaittanau yiidosona. Yin GODAA Ayyaanai a bolli wolqqappe wodhdhiis; wodhdhin a kushiyaa qachchi wottido wodoruwaa, shaloi tamaa be7idi duuxxiyoogaadan, duuteretti yeggiis.

English Sentences: And he found a new jawbone of an ass, and put forth his hand, and took it, and slew a thousand men therewith.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi mata wode haiqqida issi hariyaa gappataa demmi ekkidi, an sha7u asaa woriis.

English Sentences: And Samson said, With the jawbone of an ass, heaps upon heaps, with the jaw of an ass have I slain a thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woridi Samssooni hagaadan yaagiis; "Hariyaa gappatan taani ahaa bollan ahaa dooraas. Hariyaa gappatan sha7u asaa woraas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when he had made an end of speaking, that he cast away the jawbone out of his hand, and called that place Ramathlehi.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haasayiyoogaa wurssidoogaappe guyyiyan, ba oikkido gappataa kushiyaappe oliis; olidi he sohuwaa Raamaati-Leeha yaagidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And he was sore athirst, and called on the LORD, and said, Thou hast given this great deliverance into the hand of thy servant: and now shall I die for thirst, and fall into the hand of the uncircumcised?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Samssooni keehippe saamettidi, GODAASSI waassiiddi, "Neeni hagaa mala gita xoonuwaa taassi ne ashkkaraassi immadasa. Yaatin, taani ha77i saamuwan haiqqoo? Qassi ha qaxxarettibeennaageetu kushiyan kunddoo?" yaagidi waassiis.

English Sentences: But God clave an hollow place that was in the jaw, and there came water thereout; and when he had drunk, his spirit came again, and he revived: wherefore he called the name thereof Enhakkore, which is in Lehi unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Xoossai Leehan de7iya biittaa phalqqin, appe haattai kiyiis. Samssooni he haattaappe uyidi alido gishshau, ayyo shemppoi simmiis. Yaatin, he sohuwaa Aini-Haqqoore yaagidi sunttiis. Hegee hachchi gakkanaassi Leehan de7ees.

English Sentences: And he judged Israel in the days of the Philistines twenty years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asai biittaa haarido wode, Samssooni Israa7eelan laatamu laittau pirddiya daanna gidiis.

English Sentences: Then went Samson to Gaza, and saw there an harlot, and went in unto her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi Samssooni Gaaza giyo Pilisxxeematu katamaa biis; biidi yan issi shaaramuxa maccaasiyo be7idi, iira aqanau i keettaa geliis.

English Sentences: And it was told the Gazites, saying, Samson is come hither. And they compassed him in, and laid wait for him all night in the gate of the city, and were quiet all the night, saying, In the morning, when it is day, we shall kill him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaaza kataman de7iya asai Samssooni eta katamaa yiidoogaa siyidi, katamaa yuuyi aadhdhidi, qammaa muliyaa katamaa penggiyaa naagiiddi aqiis; "Sa7ai wonttanaashin naagidi, nuuni a worana" yaagidi qammaa muliyaa co77u giidosona.

English Sentences: And Samson lay till midnight, and arose at midnight, and took the doors of the gate of the city, and the two posts, and went away with them, bar and all, and put them upon his shoulders, and carried them up to the top of an hill that is before Hebron.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Samssooni yan zin77idoi bilahe gakkanaashin xalaala. Bilahe denddidi, katamaa dirssaa penggiyaa oikkidi, sanqqaa, qoriyaa, qosilettaanne gorddiyo hiraqota shoddiis. He ubbaakka hashiyan tookkidi, Kebroonappe sintta baggaara de7iya keraa huuphiyaa kessiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass afterward, that he loved a woman in the valley of Sorek, whose name was Delilah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Samssooni Soreeqa giyo zanggaaran de7iya issi Daliilo giyo maccaasiyo siiqiis.

English Sentences: And the lords of the Philistines came up unto her, and said unto her, Entice him, and see wherein his great strength lieth, and by what means we may prevail against him, that we may bind him to afflict him: and we will give thee every one of us eleven hundred pieces of silver.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Pilisxxeematu halaqati ikko yiidi, "Neeni a cimmada, he wolqqaa ubbaa aibippe i demmidaakkonne qassi nuuni a waati xoonidi qachchanau danddayiyaakko oichcha. Issoi issoi nuuni neeyyo issi sha7anne issi xeetu xaqara biraa immana" yaagidosona.
